rows.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
[In gratitude] for solidarity among the Quraysh,
their solidarity during winter and summer journeys,
let them worship the Lord of this House,

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
rows.translation: who has fed them [and saved them] from hunger, and secured them from fear.
rows.transliteration: alladhī aṭ`amahum min jū`in wa-āmanahum min khawf
